General.Name: Ocumetics Technology Corp
General.Description: Ocumetics Technology Corp. engages in research, development, production, and sale of vision enhancement products in Canada. The company provides intraocular lens and natural lenses. Ocumetics Technology Corp. was formerly known as Quantum Blockchain Technologies Ltd. and changed changed its name to Ocumetics Technology Corp. in August 2021. The company was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Calgary, Canada.
General.Address: 639-5th Avenue SW, Calgary, AB, Canada, T2P 0M9

2.Name: Mr. Roger M. Jewett C.A., CPA
2.Title: CFO & Director
